title: Community BBQ
details: Join us for a community-wide BBQ at the church grounds. It's a great opportunity to connect with neighbors, enjoy delicious food, and share God's love in a casual setting. All are welcome!

title: Prayer and Worship Night
details: An evening of collective prayer and worship, open to all ages. We will be praying for the local community, global missions, and personal needs. It's a time to reflect, seek God's presence, and worship together.

title: Fall Festival
details: Celebrate the season with our annual Fall Festival! There will be games, food, and activities for all ages, including a pumpkin patch and a gospel message shared by our local pastor.

title: Christmas Toy Drive
details: Help make a child's Christmas special by donating new, unwrapped toys. The toy drive will support families in need within our community. Volunteers are also needed to help distribute the toys before Christmas.

title: Neighborhood Cleanup
details: Join us as we beautify the neighborhood by picking up litter, planting flowers, and assisting in small repairs for elderly residents. This is a great way to serve and meet new people in the community.

title: Community Movie Night
details: Bring the whole family for a free outdoor movie night under the stars. Snacks and refreshments will be available, and we'll have a brief gospel message before the movie begins.

title: Thanksgiving Food Drive
details: Help provide meals for families in need this Thanksgiving by donating canned goods and non-perishable items. Volunteers are also needed to help pack and distribute food baskets to local families.

title: Back-to-School Supply Giveaway
details: We're giving away backpacks filled with school supplies to families in need. Come out for a day of fun and community as we support our local students before the new school year begins.
